text.section: Subject to policies established by the Commissioner, each warden or administrator is in direct charge of the correctional facility to which the warden or administrator is appointed.

The warden or administrator shall:
supervise the government, discipline, and policy of the correctional facility;
direct the administering of punishment prescribed by the Commissioner under § 3-205(b)(1) of this subtitle; and
enforce the regulations and directives of the Division.
